mapper.select: select id, user_id userId, user_name userName, mobile, create_time createTime, modify_time modifyTime, number_plate numberPlate from t_teacher_checkout where 1 = 1 and user_id = #{userId} and time = CURRENT_DATE

select id, user_id userId, user_name userName, mobile, create_time createTime, modify_time modifyTime, number_plate numberPlate from t_teacher_checkout where 1 = 1 and user_id = #{userId} and time = #{time} limit 1
